data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pollock, Darren A. (2016): Revision of Thisiomorphus Pic (Coleoptera: Mycteridae: Eurypinae) with descriptions of eleven new species from Central and South America and a key to genera of Neotropical Eurypinae. Zootaxa 4093 (3): 301-322, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4093.3.1|1 occurrence
